job.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job.description: we are looking for a full timecontract employee for a devops engineerltbrgtltbrgtas a key member of the devsecops team this devops engineer will a develop review modify and enhance cicd principles b install configure and maintain cicd tools ampamp platforms c develop and maintain cicd pipeline configurations and d automate processesltbrgtltbrgtin addition this devops engineer will be assigned to install configure build and deploy applications in support of eligibility supporting technology applications this position is central to ensuring these applications and services remain current across all development test training and production environmentsltbrgtltbrgtthis devops engineer will also provide environment triage support this responsibility includes both workday and nightweekend oncall support for all development test training and production environments this service helps maintain high availability for developers testers trainers and production endusers
